latex:
A five-digit palindrome is a positive integer with respective digits $abcba$, where $a$ is non-zero.  Let $S$ be the sum of all five-digit palindromes.  What is the sum of the digits of $S$?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A) }9\qquad
\textbf{(B) }18\qquad
\textbf{(C) }27\qquad
\textbf{(D) }36\qquad
\textbf{(E) }45\qquad$
